title: ALPHA CLIENT TESTER
body:
hello guys

i've been accepted to be 1 of the ALPHA CLIENT TESTER yesterday..as i finished installing it..i clicked on the launcher and it began downloading the updates. as soon as it reached 40-50mbs it disconnected and ask me to restart the download.

i did try restarting it for a couple of times..but still same. it wasnt abt my connection issues tho. most probably the client i think

i hope riot or you guys can help me fix this.

replies.body: I'm not familiar with much of the alpha, but it sounds like your network is having issues staying connected to the patching servers.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network just in case.  You should also head over to the [alpha boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work)for the most up to date troubleshooting on the alpha client.  Good luck!
